text:
Accusing the Congress of creating hurdles in the path of national development, the BJP on Sunday said Prime Minister Narendra Modi is delivering despite Opposition’s negativity.

The BJP said Opposition’s repeated “anti-government” campaigns mirrored their “complete frustration” over sustained growth of India under Mr. Modi’s stewardship.

“Where, on the one hand, world leaders are lauding the PM’s leadership and India’s growth story, Congress leaders are playing politics of lies and deceit for their selfish gains,” BJP national secretary Shrikant Sharma alleged. — PTI
title: PM delivering despite Oppn. negativity: BJP
